member.name: F:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.service
member.summary: The service which this resource belongs to.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.Search
member.summary: Searches Knowledge Graph for entities that match the constraints. A list of matched entities will be returned in response, which will be in JSON-LD format and compatible with http://schema.org

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest
member.summary: Searches Knowledge Graph for entities that match the constraints. A list of matched entities will be returned in response, which will be in JSON-LD format and compatible with http://schema.org

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Ids
member.summary: The list of entity id to be used for search instead of query string. To specify multiple ids in the HTTP request, repeat the parameter in the URL as in ...?ids=A=B

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Languages
member.summary: The list of language codes (defined in ISO 693) to run the query with, e.g. 'en'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Limit
member.summary: Limits the number of entities to be returned.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Prefix
member.summary: Enables prefix match against names and aliases of entities

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Query
member.summary: The literal query string for search.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.EntitiesResource.SearchRequest.Types
member.summary: Restricts returned entities with these types, e.g. Person (as defined in http://schema.org/Person). If multiple types are specified, returned entities will contain one or more of these types.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.Data.SearchResponse
member.summary: Response message includes the context and a list of matching results which contain the detail of associated entities.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.Data.SearchResponse.Context
member.summary: The local context applicable for the response. See more details at http://www.w3.org/TR/json-ld /#context-definitions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.Data.SearchResponse.Type
member.summary: The schema type of top-level JSON-LD object, e.g. ItemList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Kgsearch.v1.Data.SearchResponse.ItemListElement
member.summary: The item list of search results.
